dct_description_sm: dressée par M. Mrs. R. Cortambert et A. Vuillemin.
Coordinates are approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Kilométres" and "Lieues."
Shows topography, drainage, political boundaries (including colonial possessions), islands surrounding continent.
"Logerot éditeur, Quai des Augustins, 55" at bottom.
Possibly appears in Géographie élémentaire, Paris, 1874.
